repositoryCreatedBy.title: Created by user identifier
repositoryCreatedBy.description: User ID of who created the record.

repositoryLastModifiedBy.title: Modified by user identifier
repositoryLastModifiedBy.description: User ID of who last modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByUser` is set as `createdByUser`.

createdByBatchID.title: Created by batch identifier
createdByBatchID.description: The dataset files in Catalog which has been originating the creation of the record.

modifiedByBatchID.title: Modified by batch identifier
modifiedByBatchID.description: The last dataset files in Catalog which has modified the record. At creation time, `modifiedByBatchID` is set as `createdByBatchID`.

createDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was created in the repository, such as when an asset file is first uploaded or a directory is created by the server as the parent of a new asset. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

modifyDate.description: The server date and time when the resource was last modified in the repository, such as when a new version of an asset is uploaded or a directory's child resource is added or removed. The date time property should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

_id.title: Identifier
_id.description: A unique identifier for the record.

timeSeriesEvents.title: Time-series Events
timeSeriesEvents.description: List of time-series based events that relate to schemas based on record.

accountID.title: Contact Account id
accountID.description: ID of the account thatâ€™s the parent of this person.

isBlocked.title: Blocked Indicator
isBlocked.description: Indicator if the person is blocked or not.

blockedCause.title: Blocked Cause
blockedCause.description: Reason why the person is blocked.

marketingSuspendedCause.title: Marketing Suspended Cause
marketingSuspendedCause.description: Reason why the person is suspended for any marketing purposes.

isConverted.title: Converted Indicator
isConverted.description: Indicates whether the Lead was successfully converted or not.

convertedDate.title: Converted Date
convertedDate.description: Date of conversion if the lead was successfully converted.

convertedContactID.title: Converted Contact ID
convertedContactID.description: Contact Id if the lead was successfully converted.

personStatus.title: Person Status
personStatus.description: Field recording the current marketing/sales status of the Person.

personSource.title: Person Source
personSource.description: Source from where the information regarding the person was received.

personScore.title: Person Score
personScore.description: A Score generated for a person by the CRM system.

person.title: Person
person.description: An individual actor, contact, or owner.

otherAddress.title: Other Address
otherAddress.description: Other/Alternate postal address of the person.

otherPhone.title: Other Phone
otherPhone.description: Other/Alternate phone number of the person.

departments.title: Department Name
departments.description: Department name where the person works.

val.title: Choice Value
val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

preferred.title: Preferred Channel
preferred.description: User's preferred channel for receiving communications

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: A set of notifications, newsletters, etc. to which the user subscribes

mapObj.title: Subscription
mapObj.description: The name or identifier of the specific subscription

val.title: Choice Value
val.description: The value specified by the user as their preference or the basis of processing that precludes the need for user consent

subscribers.title: Subscribers
subscribers.description: The set of identifiers (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this user who have subscribed

mapObj.title: Subscriber
mapObj.description: The specific identifier (email addresses, phone numbers, etc.) for this subscriber

time.title: Preference timestamp
time.description: Date and time this specific preference was collected. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

source.title: Preference Source
source.description: Through which interface did the user provide this preference value

time.description: Timestamp of this complete set of user consents and preferences. This value should conform to ISO 8601 standard. An example form is "2004-10-23T12:00:00-06:00".

inferredAddress.title: Inferred Address
inferredAddress.description: Address details inferred by reverse IP lookup of the leadâ€™s first recorded web visit.

inferredCompany.title: Inferred Company
inferredCompany.description: Company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the leadâ€™s first recorded web visit.

inferredCompanyStatus.title: Inferred Company Status
inferredCompanyStatus.description: Status of the company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the leadâ€™s first recorded web visit.

inferredMetropolitanArea.title: Inferred Metropolitan Area
inferredMetropolitanArea.description: Metropolitan area inferred by reverse IP lookup of leadâ€™s first recorded web visit.

inferredPhoneAreaCode.title: Inferred Phone Area Code
inferredPhoneAreaCode.description: Phone area code inferred by reverse IP lookup of leadâ€™s first recorded web visit.

loyalty.description: Captures details related to the customer's loyalty rewards.

joinDate.title: Program Join Date
joinDate.description: Date which the visitor registered for the loyalty program.

loyaltyID.title: Program ID
loyaltyID.description: The loyalty program ID(s) associated with a specific user, if they are enrolled in the client's loyalty program.

points.title: Program Points Balance
points.description: Current balance of the loyalty points/awards in a visitor's loyalty account.

pointsRedeemed.title: Points Redeemed
pointsRedeemed.description: Amount of points applied toward a purchase or otherwise redeemed.

program.title: Program Name
program.description: This should define the loyalty progam in which a visitor is enrolled.

upgradeDate.title: Program Name
upgradeDate.description: Date which the customer was upgraded to the next tier level.

status.title: Status
status.description: Captures the visitor's loyalty progam status, such as active, disabled, or suspended.

tier.title: Tier
tier.description: Captures the loyalty progam tier in which a visitor is enrolled.

orgUnit.title: Organizational unit
orgUnit.description: The unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the organization details maintained in another dataset.

geoUnit.title: Geographical unit
geoUnit.description: The geographical unit within the organization owning the profile. This can be used to reference the geographical information maintained in another dataset.

personalFinances.description: Financial details including transactions, accounts, and applications.

accountCardsTotal.title: Account Cards Total
accountCardsTotal.description: Total number of account (financial) cards assigned to a user.

assignedBeneficiary.title: Assigned Beneficiaries
assignedBeneficiary.description: Captures the beneficiary(s) assigned to the account.

employmentStatus.title: Employment Status
employmentStatus.description: Tracks the employment status of the user.

ID.title: ID
ID.description: Array of financial account IDs assigned to the user.

hasAssignedBeneficiary.title: Has Assigned Beneficiary
hasAssignedBeneficiary.description: Flag determining if the account has a beneficiary assigned.

filingJointly.title: Filing Jointly
filingJointly.description: Refers to a filing status for married couples that have wed before the end of the tax year.

filingSeparately.title: Filing Separately
filingSeparately.description: Refers to married couples who choose to record their respective incomes, exemptions, and deductions on separate tax returns.

isHeadOfHousehold.title: Head of Household
isHeadOfHousehold.description: Users designed as head of household if they pay more than half the cost of supporting and housing a qualifying person.

householdIncome.title: Household Income
householdIncome.description: Refers to the combined gross income of all members of a household.

singleFiler.title: Single Filer
singleFiler.description: Refers to a taxpayer who is unmarried and does not qualify for any other filing status.

taxBracket.title: Tax Bracket
taxBracket.description: Refers to a range of incomes subject to a certain income tax rate.

preferredLanguage.title: Preferred language
preferredLanguage.description: Describes the preferred system of communication used by the profile. Language codes are expressed in BCP 47 format.

emailFormat.title: Email format
emailFormat.description: Email format preferred by the profile. This can be rich text or plain text.

timeZone.title: Time zone
timeZone.description: Describes which time zone the profile is present in, most frequently the time zone preferred by the profile. Time zones are expressed according to the IETF tz database: https://www.ietf.org/timezones/tzdb-2016i/tz-link.htm

identityPrivacyInfo.title: Identity level privacy information
identityPrivacyInfo.description: Captured privacy information for identities in profile.

identityIABConsent.title: Identity level consent information
identityIABConsent.description: Consent collected for an identity via consent management services.

consentTimestamp.title: Timestamp of consent
consentTimestamp.description: Timestamp (RFC3339) when this identity presented consent information

consentString.title: Captured consent information
consentString.description: Consent string and its specification. This can help reading application to use appropriate library.

pushNotificationTokens.title: Push notification tokens
pushNotificationTokens.description: Push notification tokens are used to communicate with applications that are installed on devices or SaaS application accounts.

pushNotificationDetails.title: Push details
pushNotificationDetails.description: Push details array containing notification info required to send mobile push notification to a specific mobile application on a given device.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.description: Subscriptions that the profile is entitled to including terminated, expired, or exhausted subscriptions.

primaryPartyID.title: Primary Party ID
primaryPartyID.description: Identifier for the primary person responsible for the subscription, which typically could be their device phone number.

bundleName.title: Bundle Name
bundleName.description: Captures the name of any type of subscription bundle in which the customer is enrolled, such as 'Internet + Media'.

internetSubscription.description: Internet subscription plan details such as data cap, connection type, and speed details.

landlineSubscription.description: Landline subscription plan details including selected features, minutes, and dialing plans.

mediaSubscription.description: media subscription plan details including number of channels & included streaming services.

mobileSubscription.description: Mobile plan details including number of lines, data rates, cost, etc.

testProfile.title: Test profile
testProfile.description: Indicates the `profile` record is for use in testing and verification purposes and should not be automatically included in normal operations.

seat.title: Seat
seat.description: Captures the user's preferred seat type for flights.

seatSection.title: Seat Section
seatSection.description: Captures the user's preferred seat sectionfor flights.

meal.title: Meal
meal.description: Tracks the user's meal preference, if provided.

preferredDepartureAirportCode.title: Preferred Departure Airport Code
preferredDepartureAirportCode.description: Records the user's preferred home/departure airport code.

ticketDelivery.title: Ticket Delivery
ticketDelivery.description: Defines the user's preferred ticket delivery method.

medicalAlerts.title: Medical Alerts
medicalAlerts.description: Captures any medical alerts for the user.

roomType.title: Room Type
roomType.description: Tracks the user's preferred room type.

smokingRoom.title: Smoking Room
smokingRoom.description: Flags if the user prefers a smoking room.

foamPillows.title: Foam Pillows
foamPillows.description: Captures if the user prefers foam pillows.

rollAwayBed.title: Roll Away Bed
rollAwayBed.description: Captures if the user requires a rollaway bed.

crib.title: Crib
crib.description: Captures if the user requires a crib.

earlyCheckIn.title: Early Check-In
earlyCheckIn.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with early check-in available.

gym.title: Gym
gym.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a gym/fitness room.

pool.title: Pool
pool.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a swimming pool.

hasRestaurant.title: Has Restaurant
hasRestaurant.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with a restaurant.

roomService.title: Room Service
roomService.description: Flags if the user prefers a lodging property with room service available.

wheelchairAccessible.title: Wheelchair Accessible
wheelchairAccessible.description: Tracks if the user requres a wheelchair accessible room.

visuallyImpairedAccessible.title: Visually Impaired Accessible
visuallyImpairedAccessible.description: Tracks if the user requres a visually impaired accessible room.

vehicleType.title: Vehicle Type
vehicleType.description: Records the user's vehicle type preference.

smokingVehicle.title: Smoking Vehicle
smokingVehicle.description: Flags if the user prefers a smoking vehicle.

manualTransmission.title: Manual Transmission
manualTransmission.description: Records if a user prefers a manual transmission instead of an automatic transmission.

userAccount.description: Loyalty details, preferences, login processes, and other account preferences.

contactDetails.title: Contact Details
contactDetails.description: Extension of the Personal Profile data type.

startDate.title: Start Date
startDate.description: Date when the account was opened.

status.title: Status
status.description: This should describe the current status of the account

accountType.title: Account Type
accountType.description: Captures the user account type, if applicable.

productPreferences.title: Product Preferences
productPreferences.description: Product, shopping, or experience preferences such as gender, color pref, seat/aisle, king/double bed, etc.

alertStatus.title: Alert Status
alertStatus.description: Captures whether or not alerts have been enabled for the account.

autopayStatus.title: Autopay Status
autopayStatus.description: Captures whether or not the account has been enrolled in autopay.
